official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to potential cancer risks associated with past radiation treatment of tonsil, adenoid, thymus, and similar problems.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that every individual who has undergone extensive radiation treatment for tonsil, adenoid, thymus, or similar problems should be made aware of the potential risk of developing cancer because of such treatments, and of the need for regular physical checkups as a result of the risk.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to potential cancer risks associated with past radiation treatment of tonsil, adenoid, thymus, and similar problems.
